name: Dino Run 3D
description:
Run like a Dino thought the Jurassic landscape and try to jump over or slide under all obstacles.
How far can your Dino run?
Collect eggs and unlock other adorable Dino runners.

Features:
◉ Endless fun
◉ Beautiful handmade 3d graphics
◉ Various skins to unlock
◉ Haptic feedback
◉ Optimization for all screens
